description: Translate only rows where typeclas has an NFL value.
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID.
Maps source value to SOIL_MOIST_REG using lists of values.

Note that every polygon is either LYR or NFL, not both. If stand structure is C, V, S or M, return 100. If stand structure is H, return structure_val multiplied by 10. If structure is horizontal and percent is zero, return 100.

translation_rules: fvi01_countOfNotNull({species_1_layer1, species_2_layer1, species_3_layer1, species_4_layer1}, {species_1_layer2, species_2_layer2, species_3_layer2, species_4_layer2}, typeclas_layer1, typeclas_layer2, layer)
description: Count layers up to max_layer_number which is set by the createMappingsView() function in the workflow. Counts layer 1 if typeclass is forested (i.e. not an NFL class, this avoids double counting where layer is nfl but also has nfl specific species codes assigned) and species 1, 2, 3 or 4 is present. Counts layer 2 if mintypeclass is forested and species 1, 2, 3 or 4 is present. Counts layer 1 and layer 2 nfl if nfl codes is present.
Layer rank is assigned as 1 for overstory layer (e.g. typeclas), and 2 for understory layer (e.g. mintypeclas).
Copies source value. Only return crown closure  if row is nfl. Since polygon is either treed, shrub, herb or bryoid, crown closure is specific to whichever type is defined in the typeclas attribute.
Copies source value. Only return crown closure  if row is nfl. Since polygon is either treed, shrub, herb or bryoid, crown closure is specific to whichever type is defined in the typeclas attribute.
Attribute does not occur. Height only applies to dominant and co-dominant trees
Attribute does not occur. Height only applies to dominant and co-dominant trees
Maps source value to NAT_NON_VEG using list of values
Maps source value to NON_FOR_ANTH using list of values
Maps source value to NON_FOR_VEG using list of values.
